channel.title: Vtech on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Vtech on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Clone Wars
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Often, retrospectives on computer history focus pretty intently on the IBM PC era and how that system’s many clones helped to democratize computing by centering most computing-industry efforts on a single platform—a major breakthrough at the time. But other platforms attracted clones as well—including the Apple II, though the computing giant’s protectionist habits kicked in quickly. And oddly enough, it may have the best thing for everyone involved—including consumers.
